zh-cn: 孝敬宪皇后乌拉那拉氏

description.zh-cn: 清朝雍正帝的皇后，内大臣费扬古之女，满洲正黄旗人。
description.en: Empress consort of the Yongzheng Emperor of the Qing dynasty, daughter of the minister Fiyanggū. She was a Manchu of the Plain Yellow Banner.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝，清世宗。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty, Emperor Shizong of Qing.

description.zh-cn: 清朝内大臣，孝敬宪皇后之父。
description.en: A minister (Neidachen) of the Qing dynasty and the father of Empress Xiaojingxian.

description.zh-cn: 孝敬宪皇后之母。
description.en: Mother of Empress Xiaojingxian.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝嫡长子，生母为孝敬宪皇后，八岁夭折。
description.en: The eldest legitimate son of the Yongzheng Emperor, his mother was Empress Xiaojingxian. He died at the age of eight.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，清圣祖。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty, Emperor Shengzu of Qing.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝的皇贵妃，雍正帝的生母。
description.en: An Imperial Noble Consort of the Kangxi Emperor and the birth mother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝，雍正帝第四子。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty, the fourth son of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第七位皇帝，乾隆帝第十五子。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Qing dynasty, the fifteenth son of the Qianlong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清代皇子、亲王正妻的封号。
description.en: The title for the primary consort of an imperial prince in the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 皇帝正妻的封号。
description.en: The title for the primary consort of an emperor.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的一座清代皇家园林，孝敬宪皇后逝世于此。
description.en: A royal garden of the Qing dynasty in Beijing, where Empress Xiaojingxian passed away.

description.zh-cn: 清代八旗之一。
description.en: One of the Eight Banners of the Qing dynasty.

en: Princess Shushen of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 废太子允礽第六女，由雍正帝抚养，为孝敬宪皇后养女之一。
description.en: The sixth daughter of the deposed Crown Prince Yunreng, raised by the Yongzheng Emperor and one of the adopted daughters of Empress Xiaojingxian.

en: Princess Hehui of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 怡亲王允祥第四女，由雍正帝抚养，为孝敬宪皇后养女之一。
description.en: The fourth daughter of Prince Yi, Yunxiang, raised by the Yongzheng Emperor and one of the adopted daughters of Empress Xiaojingxian.

en: Princess Duanrou of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 庄亲王允禄长女，由雍正帝抚养，为孝敬宪皇后养女之一。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Prince Zhuang, Yunlu, raised by the Yongzheng Emperor and one of the adopted daughters of Empress Xiaojingxian.

description.zh-cn: 孝敬宪皇后是雍正帝的嫡福晋，后被册立为皇后。
description.en: Empress Xiaojingxian was the primary consort of the Yongzheng Emperor and was later instated as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 孝敬宪皇后是内大臣费扬古的女儿。
description.en: Empress Xiaojingxian was the daughter of the minister Fiyanggū.

description.zh-cn: 根据考证，孝敬宪皇后为费扬古嫡妻多罗格格觉罗氏所生。
description.en: According to research, Empress Xiaojingxian was born to Fiyanggū's primary wife, Lady Gioro.

description.zh-cn: 弘晖是孝敬宪皇后所生的亲生儿子。
description.en: Honghui was the biological son of Empress Xiaojingxian.

description.zh-cn: 弘晖是雍正帝的嫡长子。
description.en: Honghui was the eldest legitimate son of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝将乌拉那拉氏指婚给皇四子胤禛，册为嫡福晋。
description.en: The Kangxi Emperor arranged the marriage of Lady Ulanara to his fourth son, Yinzhen, installing her as the primary consort.

description.zh-cn: 胤禛是康熙帝的皇四子。
description.en: Yinzhen was the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 胤禛的生母是孝恭仁皇后。
description.en: Yinzhen's birth mother was Empress Xiaogongren.

description.zh-cn: 1691年，乌拉那拉氏被册立为雍亲王胤禛的嫡福晋。
description.en: In 1691, Lady Ulanara was installed as the primary consort of Prince Yong, Yinzhen.

description.zh-cn: 1722年12月，雍正帝登基后，册立乌拉那拉氏为皇后。
description.en: In December 1722, after the Yongzheng Emperor ascended the throne, he instated Lady Ulanara as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝登基后，追封皇后之父费扬古为一等公，后于1730年加赠为一等承恩公。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Yongzheng Emperor posthumously honored his empress's father, Fiyanggū, as a Duke of the First Rank, and later in 1730, granted him the additional title of Duke Cheng'en of the First Rank.

description.zh-cn: 雍正十三年（1735年）十一月，乾隆帝为孝敬宪皇后增加谥号。
description.en: In November 1735, the Qianlong Emperor added to the posthumous title of Empress Xiaojingxian.

description.zh-cn: 嘉庆帝于1799年和1820年两次为孝敬宪皇后累加谥号。
description.en: The Jiaqing Emperor added to the posthumous title of Empress Xiaojingxian on two occasions, in 1799 and 1820.

description.zh-cn: 孝敬宪皇后出身于满洲正黄旗。
description.en: Empress Xiaojingxian was from the Manchu Plain Yellow Banner.

description.zh-cn: 和硕淑慎公主为孝敬宪皇后的养女。
description.en: Princess Shushen of the First Rank was an adopted daughter of Empress Xiaojingxian.

description.zh-cn: 和硕和惠公主为孝敬宪皇后的养女。
description.en: Princess Hehui of the First Rank was an adopted daughter of Empress Xiaojingxian.

description.zh-cn: 和硕端柔公主为孝敬宪皇后的养女。
description.en: Princess Duanrou of the First Rank was an adopted daughter of Empress Xiaojingxian.
